Class ReviewService

java.lang.Object
com.FeedEmGreens.HealthyAura.service.ReviewService
@Service public class ReviewService extends Object
Service layer responsible for managing user reviews, ratings, and moderation workflows.

This class serves as the core business logic for the review system, providing functionality such as:

  • Submitting, editing, and deleting reviews
  • Awarding or deducting points via RewardsService
  • Administrative review moderation (approve, hide, delete)
  • Flagging inappropriate reviews for follow-up
  • Aggregating review statistics for analytics and recommendations

It interacts closely with repositories for Review, ReviewFlag, Eatery, and Users entities, ensuring transactional safety and data consistency during review submission or moderation.

Since:
2025-11-07
Version:
1.0

  • Method Details

    • createOrUpdateReview

      @Transactional public ReviewResponse createOrUpdateReview(Long eateryId, ReviewRequest request)
      Creates a new review or updates an existing one for a specific eatery.

      Includes validation for:

      • Score range (1–5)
      • Daily review submission limit (max 5/day)
      • 7-day cooldown between reviews for the same eatery
      • Photo upload limit (max 3)

      New reviews earn points, while edited ones do not.

      Parameters:
      eateryId - the ID of the eatery being reviewed
      request - the submitted review details
      Returns:
      a ReviewResponse DTO representing the created or updated review
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the user or eatery cannot be found
      IllegalArgumentException - if validation fails

    • getReviewsForEatery

      public List<ReviewResponse> getReviewsForEatery(Long eateryId, String sortBy)
      Retrieves all visible reviews for an eatery, supporting multiple sorting modes:
      • RECENT – newest first (default)
      • HEALTH – highest health rating first
      • HYGIENE – highest hygiene rating first
      Parameters:
      eateryId - the target eatery’s ID
      sortBy - sorting option
      Returns:
      a list of ReviewResponse DTOs

    • approveReviewByAdmin

      @Transactional public void approveReviewByAdmin(Long reviewId, Long flagId, String notes)
      Approves a flagged review (clears flag as dismissed).
      Parameters:
      reviewId - the ID of the reviewed item
      flagId - the associated flag to dismiss
      notes - optional admin notes

    • hideReviewByAdmin

      @Transactional public void hideReviewByAdmin(Long reviewId, String reason)
      Hides a review (keeps in DB but invisible to public).

    • deleteReviewByAdmin

      @Transactional public void deleteReviewByAdmin(Long reviewId, String reason)
      Soft-deletes a review (user data remains for analytics but is hidden).

    • updateReview

      @Transactional public ReviewResponse updateReview(Long reviewId, ReviewRequest request)
      Updates an existing review belonging to the current user.

    • deleteReview

      @Transactional public void deleteReview(Long reviewId)
      Soft-deletes a user’s own review.

    • flagReview

      @Transactional public void flagReview(Long reviewId, ReviewFlagRequest request)
      Allows a user to flag an inappropriate review for admin moderation.
